text: Anɨgɨl mɨdɨlaknɨŋ, kɨlop agak, Yad bɨ Juda nɨb ak, yɨp tɨkɨlak Silisiya plopens taun Tasus agak. Pen yad apɨl Jelusalem awl, tisa Gamaliyel ayɨp mɨdɨl awl gɨnek ak nɨm, apɨs based sɨkop tɨtay agɨlak takaw ak mɨdupsek, yɨp agñek nɨgɨnek agak. Anɨb ak, nɨbi God nop dɨtep gun agɨl, kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨpɨm tek, yad abe gelɨgɨpin agak.
